page.title: 05A WEEK IN OUR SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is a combined junior/infant school with about 250 children and 8 teachers.School starts at 9.00am and we have an assembly every day at about 9.10am.Sometimes we have a short service sometimes we have a radio service.We have three playtimes a day, one at 10.40am for 15 mins one at 12.00pm for lunch (an hour) and our last play at 2.05pm for 10 mins.For morning lessons we usually have maths and English. For afternoon lessons we have history, art and craft; most of us enjoy{ {science lessons}best of all.The lesson we all hate is{handwriting.}Our recorder lessons are on a Monday.We have violin lessons, cornet lessons, clarinet lessons and flute lessons on a Tuesday.We have film club in school but not very often,we have computer club and choir.
